amendment.description: Amendment reduces and then increases funding for the DOE Office of Inspector General by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $1 million in funding within the account for the Office of Inspector General.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Matheson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Matheson.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Matheson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
